description:
Two of the four Saint Beasts are dead – or so Yusuke and his team believe! But in the chamber of Seiryu, a Beast who can trap his enemies in ice, an unexpected guest arrives. How can two Beasts in one room be stopped?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiei luptă! Sabia lui îi taie pe duşmani in bucăţi!
飛影出戦! 切り裂く剣
